1.1. Introduction¶

ITTIA DB IoT™ is an advanced time series database designed especially for real-time and embedded systems with single and multi-core support. It is an out-of-box database tailored to MCUs to provide a safe and efficient way to organize timestamped data on local flash media of any size, much larger than RAM. Innovative data processing and data management tools are provided with advanced database features. Ideal for embedded device applications in various markets including: industrial automation, wearable devices, consumer electronics, medical devices and more.

Figure 1.1: Components of a Device Embedded with ITTIA DB IoT

Targeting MCUs, ITTIA’s DB IoT is tailored for:

  • Fast ingestion rate
  • High throughput
  • Formatted data export

Low-power devices at the edge typically offer constrained resources that can benefit from well-defined functionalities. Developers are given the freedom to exploit such performance gains by maximizing their code coverage through ITTIA’s DB IoT. An API is provided to simplify the organization, ingestion, and querying of real-time data on edge devices.

Instead of building a custom database you can benefit from the lightweight database engine called ITTIA DB IoT by embedding it in many off-the-shelf MCUs.
